column1: This waiver will allow boats and their crew to continue their work as a critical component of our domestic food production system without fearing exposure to COVID-19.

UPDATE: I am pleased that NOAA has now decided albeit at the last minute to extend the waiver for At-Sea Monitors until August. COVID-19 has disrupted huge segments of our economy and it has had a particularly severe impact on our fishing community.

Our offices are handling constituent inquiries via telephone only until further notice. Please call 1-800-870-2626 if you require assistance. The best and most accurate information on COVID-19 can be found on the CDC’s website at https://t.co/2qhXnhxSHH
